text:
Tasmanian State Service (Restructuring) Order (No. 2) 1999

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and on the recommendation of the Minister, make the following order under section 24 of the Tasmanian State Service Act 1984 .

23 August 1999

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

J. A. BACON

Premier

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Tasmanian State Service (Restructuring) Order (No. 2) 1999 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Amalgamation of Property Tasmania with Department of Treasury and Finance
    Property Tasmania, part of the Department of Primary Industries, Water and Environment, is amalgamated with the Department of Treasury and Finance.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 1 September 1999

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
